name: Robo Ball
overview: Robo Ball is a game of American-style Football that is played with programmable robot players. It is a 2 player game and each player can individually set the plays for each of his offensive and defensive players. It follows many of the standard rules of football, but there are some differences. There are only six players on each side, the game lasts only 15 minutes, the robots cannot change their plays after they are set, etc.
